Tactical pick reasoning: We want to be aggressive and to dominate the board. Grabbing an apple now gives us the lead (1-0), which lets us pressure and potentially force risky head-ons later. The apple at (1,3) is right there and safe to take. We'll get growth and the initiative while still keeping multiple escape options next turn.
